name: IDBVersionChangeEvent
description: The IDBVersionChangeEvent interface of the IndexedDB API indicates that the version of the database has changed, as the result of an IDBOpenDBRequest.onupgradeneeded event handler function.

refs.name: Indexed Database API 2.0
